backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing configuration file updates tied to a relationship start‑date change.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend Valentine-themed components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all Valentine sections, ambient effects, music toggle, and surprise trigger into the main page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Custom Tailwind theme with romantic color palette, glow utilities, fonts, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/valentine/audio/useBackgrou: Hook managing global looping background music with play, pause, and volume swell controls.
frontend/src/valentine/components/ambien: Renders a glowing radial backdrop that pulses unless reduced-motion is preferred.
Displays a pulsing heartbeat circle animation, disabled when reduced-motion is preferred.
Shows animated sparkles drifting upward with staggered timing unless reduced-motion is enabled.
Creates a gradient sunset-style backdrop with optional slow pulsing animation.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Ambien: Renders a canvas with floating animated heart particles unless reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/valentine/components/DaysSi: Displays days elapsed since a configured start date, updating every minute inside a styled Section.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Floati: Shows floating heart icons that rise with randomized animation timing unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Hearts: Creates a burst animation of heart icons radiating outward with randomized angles and distances.
frontend/src/valentine/components/MusicT: Button that toggles background music playback and updates icon based on state.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Playfu: A 'No' button that moves away when hovered a few times before showing a playful message.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Sectio: Wraps content in a scroll-reveal animated section using visibility detection.
frontend/src/valentine/components/Surpri: Modal component with overlay, escape-key close handling, and scroll locking while open.
Button that opens a SurpriseModal displaying a configured message.
frontend/src/valentine/config.ts: Defines the relationship start date and the surprise message string.
frontend/src/valentine/hooks/usePrefersR: Hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion media setting.
frontend/src/valentine/hooks/useScrollRe: Hook providing scroll-based visibility detection with IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/valentine/sections/ClosingS: Final Section component displaying heartfelt closing text and styling.
frontend/src/valentine/sections/FinaleSe: Renders the final interactive Valentine section with a YES button that triggers animations, music swell, and a heartfelt message.
frontend/src/valentine/sections/HeroSect: Implements the hero section with floating hearts, romantic headings, and a button that smooth-scrolls to the next section.
frontend/src/valentine/sections/PhotoGal: Displays a grid of heart-framed gallery images showing romantic moments.
frontend/src/valentine/sections/StorySec: Defines multiple themed story sections with ambient backdrops and provided romantic text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine website.
